The faculties that some ascetics and bra: The eye faculty, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
The ear faculty, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
The nose faculty, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
The tongue faculty, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
The body faculty, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
The mind faculty, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
